import React from 'react'; import { User, GraduationCap, Code, Lightbulb, MapPin, Github } from 'lucide-react'; const About: React.FC = () => { const highlights = [ { icon: , title: "Final Year Student", description: "Pursuing my degree with a strong focus on software engineering and backend development" }, { icon: , title: "Backend Developer", description: "Specializing in Java, Spring Framework, and building robust server-side applications" }, { icon: , title: "Problem Solver", description: "Passionate about tackling complex challenges and creating innovative solutions" } ]; return (

About Me

I'm a passionate backend developer who loves turning ideas into reality through clean, efficient code

{/* Left Column - Text Content */}

Who I Am

I'm a final year student from Delhi, India with a deep passion for backend development and server-side technologies. My journey in programming started with Java, and I've since become proficient in Spring Framework, JWT authentication, and building scalable REST APIs.

I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and creating robust backend systems that can handle real-world challenges. When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with fellow developers.

{/* Key Highlights */}
{highlights.map((highlight, index) => (
{highlight.icon}

{highlight.title}

{highlight.description}

))}
{/* Right Column - Visual Element */}

What I'm Currently Working On

Expanding my knowledge in Android Development and advanced Java patterns

3+
Years Coding
20
GitHub Repos
5+
Technologies
100%
Dedication
{/* Location and GitHub */}
Delhi, India
@Nitish-11k
); }; export default About;
